## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3c87a27dcd130cfef17d8390579d6584dad1ea166da2dfed348b5a0faa29102b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'tktoken' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
